results.title: Hypoxic-ischemic related cerebrovascular changes and potential therapeutic strategies in the neonatal brain
results.text_hl: However, some studies have reported beneficial effects of @DISEASE_Hypothermia @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@, @GENE_EPO @GENE_2056 @@@erythropoietin@@@, stem cell therapy, anti-cytokine therapy and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in ameliorating several different facets of @DISEASE_Thoracic_Outlet_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D013901 @@@damage to the NVU@@@ after @<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@-related @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D001930 @@@brain injury@@@ in the perinatal period.

results.title: Subacute metformin treatment reduces inflammation and improves functional outcome following neonatal hypoxia ischemia
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ represents a promising treatment strategy following @<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@.

results.title: The effect of chronic exposure to metformin in a new type-2 diabetic NONcNZO10/LtJ mouse model of stroke.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ received either @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or vehicle for 4 weeks before undergoing a @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D002534 @@@hypoxic@@@/@DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@HI@@@) insult.

results.title: Activating Endogenous Neural Precursor Cells Using Metformin Leads to Neural Repair and Functional Recovery in a Model of Childhood Brain Injury
results.text_hl: Importantly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment following @<m>DISEASE_Hypoxia_Ischemia_Brain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020925 @@@H/I@@@ restores sensory-motor function.
